chunk.source: Console.Write("Enter Grid Size in (RowNumber,ColumnNumber) format followed by Enter key : ");

chunk.source: public static IGrid GetNextGenerationGrid(IGrid currentGrid,IGameRules gameRules)
// TODO: add assertions to method UiHelperTest.GetGridSize(String)
//create a grid and initialize it with dead cells //var grid = CreateGrid(numberofRows, numberOfcolumns);
throw new ArgumentException(string.Format("The row column pair {0} has no rowColumn separator", rowColumnPair));
throw new ArgumentException(string.Format("The row column pair {0} is not valid", rowColumnPair));
throw new ArgumentException(string.Format("The row column pair {0} is not valid", rowColumnPair));
throw new ArgumentException(string.Format("The row column pair {0} is not valid", rowColumnPair));
private static IPosition ParseCellPosition(string rowColumnPair, IGridSize gridSize)
throw new ArgumentException(string.Format("The row column pair {0} has no rowColumn separator", rowColumnPair));
throw new ArgumentException(string.Format("The row column pair {0} is not valid", rowColumnPair));
if (!Int32.TryParse(cellIndex[0], out rowIndex) || rowIndex < 0 || rowIndex >= gridSize.Rows)
throw new ArgumentException(string.Format("The row column pair {0} is not valid", rowColumnPair));
if (!Int32.TryParse(cellIndex[1], out colIndex) || colIndex < 0 || colIndex >= gridSize.Columns)
throw new ArgumentException(string.Format("The row column pair {0} is not valid", rowColumnPair));
throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("rows", "rows value must be > 0");
throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("columns", "columns value must be > 0");
